Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Gen AI - it is always there with us whenever we need and will get immediate responses. Also, it provide suitable and easiest way of study modes.
Teacher - he/she won't be available everytime. But, offer direct interactions by knowing the students way of learning, skills and other things.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
feedback from Gen Ai will be very clear but lacks emotional touches and motivations
that the teacher provides.
